overview: Modern punk and Hardcore documentary  Featuring bands 454 Big Block, Agent Orange, Bad Religion, Battery, Blink-182, Bloodlet, Bouncing Souls, Deadguy, Despair, Earth Crisis, Endeavor, Face to Face, Good Riddance, H2O, Hatebreed, Homegrown, Ignite, Less Than Jake, Lifetime, Madball, MXPX, Quit, Shelter, Sick of It All, Squirtgun, Tripface, Vacant Andys, Vision of Disorder, Weston, Yuppicide
title: Release
